body: This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/TokTok/qTox/496)

comment_data.body: When refactoring this, why not just remove the unreachable error conditions instead of making the unreachable content nicer? Alternatively, `nothrow`-new could be used, but not sure it's worth it.
comment_data.diff_hunk:

+                                                             const ICoreSettings& settings,
+                                                             IBootstrapListGenerator& bootstrapNodes)
 {
     auto* thread = new QThread();
     if (thread == nullptr) {

comment_data.body: Yeah, no need to keep the wrong code :).
